_header: O lily flower of sweet odour
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: James Ryman, an orison to the Virgin Mary — three quatrains with internal rhyme; with refrain ‘Ora pro nobis’ and burden: ‘Sancta Maria ora pro nobis’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O lylly flowre of swete odowreIn whois chast bowre Oure
                    sauyour…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And atte oure ende to graunt us blysOra pro
                    nobis
